snippet.title: Mira and the Mysteries of Alchemy - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
After making a big mistake while trying to craft a potion at the alchemy university, the apprentice alchemist Mira finds that she has exposed herself to an elixir that's turning her into a cat. Now she must go in search of the ingredients, so she can craft the antidote.

Mira and the Mysteries of Alchemy on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1328920/Mira_and_the_Mysteries_of_Alchemy/
